mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM operation_log WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE()
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%H:00') AS hour, operation, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM operation_log WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY hour, operation ORDER BY hour
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM operation_log WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND operation = 'LOGIN'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM operation_log WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND operation = 'LOGIN'

SELECT HOUR(create_time) as hour, (DAYOFWEEK(create_time) + 5) % 7 as dayOfWeek, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as cnt FROM operation_log WHERE create_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} GROUP BY dayOfWeek, hour
